feed.title: matt sullivan
feed.subtitle: I am a ux/product designer with a background in human centered design. designs with data & user research most of the time, intuition & experience the rest of the time.

entry.title: vox
entry.content:
Being a part of the original Voxdotcom design team was extremely rewarding and hectic — over the course of a few months the team went from mocks to prototypes to a full production buildout and live. During this project I was involved primarily with refining the homepage and interacting with both the design and code to focus on clarity of information, good design, and clean code.

While my main focus was on the homepage redesign and various problem sloving involved with it I also touched a bunch of smaller things like storystreams and various interactions across the site.

vox.com

An early homepaage exploration

An early homepaage exploration

An early homepaage exploration
entry.summary: Being a part of the original Voxdotcom design team was extremely rewarding and hectic — over the course of a few months the team went from mocks to prototypes to a full production buildout and live. During this project I was involved primarily with refining the homepage and interacting with both the design and code to focus on clarity of information, good design, and clean code.

entry.title: insights
entry.content:
I worked on a small team to help redesign our analytics platform. My duties included establishing a modular design system of patterns to help tell the story of a brand partner’s performance through data.

One of the main challenges of the project was to establish design patterns that would work across all types of campaigns, while pulling out the most relevant pieces of the data story. We used a blend of data visualization and natural language summaries to achive this goal.

An early iteration of Insights which included graphs and other data visualizations to help with digesting numbers and other data points.

A sketched iteration on how to give users a peak into what types of data is included in a campaign — our goal was to try and make things easily glanceable.

An later mock of a campaign page, which eventually shaped a good portion of the visual design of Insights.
entry.summary: I worked on a small team to help redesign our analytics platform. My duties included establishing a modular design system of patterns to help tell the story of a brand partner’s performance through data. One of the main challenges of the project was to establish design patterns that would work across all types of campaigns, while pulling out the most relevant pieces of the data story. We used a blend of data visualization and natural language summaries to achive this goal.

entry.title: hymnal
entry.content:
For the better part of last year, I worked on the product design and development of Vox Media’s proprietary custom display and native ad unit publishing platform, Hymnal.

I worked on a small but mighty team on creating the best user experience possible on a platform that’s a workhorse for the company’s bottom line. I’ve had the pleasure of conducting several product design sprints with the team, guiding/contributing to everything from wireframes to sketching to prototyping to ultimately testing the platform on users.
entry.summary: For the better part of last year, I worked on the product design and development of Vox Media’s proprietary custom display and native ad unit publishing platform, Hymnal. I worked on a small but mighty team on creating the best user experience possible on a platform that’s a workhorse for the company’s bottom line. I’ve had the pleasure of conducting several product design sprints with the team, guiding/contributing to everything from wireframes to sketching to prototyping to ultimately testing the platform on users.

entry.title: about
entry.content:
hi, i’m matt. i’m a ux/product designer who’s been working in the digital medium since 2010.

currently, I’m doing product design for internal tools @ vox media. when I’m not thinking about bad dark patterns or modular design elements i enjoy baking and lounging around with my cat, χ.

any questions please reach out otherwise enjoy the limited selection of work below.
entry.summary: hi, i’m matt. i’m a ux/product designer who’s been working in the digital medium since 2010. currently, I’m doing product design for internal tools @ vox media. when I’m not thinking about bad dark patterns or modular design elements i enjoy baking and lounging around with my cat, χ. any questions please reach out otherwise enjoy the limited selection of work below.
